about_the_game:
Welcome to the DEMO

This DEMO contains single map for my upcoming game.
You will start in the your Hideout where you will be able to pick your weapons and attachments.
Next you will head to the blue van to start the mission.
Your goal is to find at least one clue while killing as many enemies as you can!
Remember, one bullet is all you need to kill and die in this game.

content_descriptors.notes: It is a game about fighting crime with guns so some violence is there but it is depicted in cartoon way

detailed_description:
Welcome to the DEMO

This DEMO contains single map for my upcoming game.
You will start in the your Hideout where you will be able to pick your weapons and attachments.
Next you will head to the blue van to start the mission.
Your goal is to find at least one clue while killing as many enemies as you can!
Remember, one bullet is all you need to kill and die in this game.
name: Rapid Fire Justice Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-6400
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 960
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible 16-bit sound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i7-7700k
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1060Ti
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible 16-bit sound
  • VR Support: Version 11

short_description: DEMO containing single map for RAPID FIRE JUSTICE. Try to get best time possible and let me know of any bugs you find.
